data.eml:eml: Two new species of Pselaphodes Westwood and new record of Taiwanophodes minor Hlavac from South China (Coleoptera, Staphylinidae, Pselaphinae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Yin, Zi-Wei, Li, Li-Zhen, Zhao, Mei-Jun (2012): Two new species of Pselaphodes Westwood and new record of Taiwanophodes minor Hlavac from South China (Coleoptera, Staphylinidae, Pselaphinae). ZooKeys 175: 75-86, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.175.2664, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.175.2664
